channel.title: Need Your Opion!
channel.description:
Hey, I don't know if this is the right section, but if not, move it :D
Well, i'm devoloping my server, and I got a tricky question...
What do you like more in a server? < - Vote ^
I hate custom items, but I want to know what the players think of them first...
Thanks... :D
(I don't really count Vesta, Statius, Ect. as custom item... More of a RS item...)

item.title: Need Your Opion!
item.dc:creator: @chippeh chippeh
item.description:
@chippeh wrote:

Customs are good for attracting people, especially if you make your own which no other server has ;)…
And have a server with SOMEWHAT difficult training, but not to hard or people will give up and go. A good economy is also good, just have some fun items for players aswell.

I would honestly say the best type of server is a stable one that can stay up for long periods of time…

Read full topic

item.title: Need Your Opion!

item.description:

ur worrying about a typo??
[/quote]well first yea and this should be in the general discussion section ^^
[/quote] It has to do with the server. I never said statius was a custom…[/quote]

well as you can see… this is the ‘server “help”’ section… not the talk about the server, or ask opinions…

item.title: Need Your Opion!
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Despair Mr. Despair
item.description:
@Mr_Despair wrote:

Eh, you can’t really answer that question. Some players like custom items and others doesn’t. But players DO like PvP items, statius full helm, etc…
